After I make a normal design, with ok line spacing, and then the same design download, the line spacing is AUTOMATIC CHANGE. I try to change, visibly change, save the changed design and save it again with the changed spacing. I also have video proof.

I believe in you and I believe it’s just an ordinary bug, but please, it takes too long. Please resolve.

Your faithful user, <NAME>.
